mapper.select: SELECT user.nickname as user_name, body, profile_img FROM user LEFT OUTER JOIN profile ON profile.user_id = user.id WHERE user.id = #{user_id}

SELECT board.id as id, category_id, user_id, board_type.name as type, title, body, is_hide, is_complete, is_anonymous, created_at, modified_at, comment_cnt, like_cnt, report_cnt, images_url FROM board INNER JOIN board_type ON board.id = board_type.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at LIMIT #{params.recordSize} OFFSET #{params.offset} ORDER BY created_at DESC
